text: (eyata maryam tama deviyanta) “mage deviyane! kisima miniseku ma hata lam novi sitiyadi mata kese nam daruveku æti viya hækida?”yi pævasuvaya. (eyata) mesema allah taman adahas kala dæya utpadanaya karanneya. ohu vastuvak (utpadanaya kirimata) adahas kalahot eya ‘vanu’ yayi pævasimama (æti pramadayayi!) eya evelema sidu vanneya” yayi pævasuveya
